Name: total intensity
Description: Integrated intensity of the region of interest (ROI)

Name: mean
Description: Mean intensity value of the ROI

Name: median
Description: The median value of pixels in the ROI

Name: mode
Description: The mode of the intensity values

Name: min
Description: Minimum intensity value in the ROI

Name: max
Description: Maximum intensity value in the ROI

Name: range
Description: Range between the maximmu and minimum

Name: normalized range
Description: intensity range of the ROI to intensity range of all the ROIs

Name: skewness
Description: alternativ estimator skewness  - the 3rd standardized moment

Name: excess kurtosis
Description: Excess kurtosis - the 4th standardized moment (Fisher-corrected formula, IBSI feature IPH6)
